attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To introduce an immigration tax of £15000 on all those who are not residents of the EU applying to enter the UK and seeking to reside here or apply for UK Citizenship. Persons from the former Commonwealth wishing to enter the UK and reside here or apply for UK Citizenship to be subject to a discounted tax of £10000. Illegal immigrants currently in the UK to be offered the opportunity to become legal on paying the £15000 immigration tax or face deportation. Employers convicted of employing Illegal immigrants to be made to pay the Immigration Tax of £15000 for each of their illegally employed staff in order to make them legal. Purpose of the Immigration Tax would be to offset the National Debt.
